abstract: New York State Supreme Court Judge ShawnDya L Simpson dismisses charges of torturing and injuring an animal brought against Brooklyn man Andre Robinson after he was caught on video kicking stray cat; cites lack of evidence that cat was seriously injured; lesser charges remain in place.
lead_paragraph: A Brooklyn judge ruled there was no proof that the stray kicked by Andre Robinson, in a notorious video posted on Facebook, had been injured.
snippet: A Brooklyn judge ruled there was no proof that the stray kicked by Andre Robinson, in a notorious video posted on Facebook, had been injured.

keywords.value: American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: In Cat-Kicking Case, Judge Dismisses Most Serious Charge
headline.print_headline: Judge Drops Main Charge a Cat-Kicker Was Facing
